Uses of Package
org.apache.sis.gui.map

Packages that use org.apache.sis.gui.map
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Widgets showing GridCoverage images or sample values.
org.apache.sis.gui.map
Widgets for showing a map in a JavaFX application.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.gui.map used by org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
    Class
    Description
    MapCanvas
    A canvas for maps to be rendered on screen in a JavaFX application.
    MapCanvasAWT
    A canvas for maps to be rendered using Java2D from Abstract Window Toolkit.
    MapCanvasAWT.Renderer
    A snapshot of MapCanvasAWT state to paint as an image.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.gui.map used by org.apache.sis.gui.map
    Class
    Description
    MapCanvas
    A canvas for maps to be rendered on screen in a JavaFX application.
    MapCanvas.Renderer
    A snapshot of MapCanvas state to render as a map, together with rendering code.
    MapCanvasAWT.Renderer
    A snapshot of MapCanvasAWT state to paint as an image.
    StatusBar
    A status bar showing geographic or projected coordinates under mouse cursor.
    ValuesUnderCursor
    Provider of textual content to show in a StatusBar for values under cursor position.
